attributes.action: Provide Financial Help to parents on low income.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Children of parents on low income are entitled to a free school meal. This is because it is felt parents could not otherwise afford to give their children a hot filling meal. But no help is available out of term time. Shopping bills soar at this time and parents on low income find it hard to give the children nutritious and filling meals. Extra financial help is needed.
